fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to sting a player, preventing them from using an ability the following night.
- Use 2 bees to investigate a player and find their role.
- Use 3 bees to deal a powerful attack to a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.
